info:
This website is where I post my articles. Articles on literally Anything. Kinda like it's a second brain.
This is my Obsidian vault turned into a website with Quartz v4.1.5.

Easy Navmap to navigate my articles.

title: ðŸ¦–OldMartijntjeâ€™s Playground
info:
This is my old website which is just a dump where I used to test stuff, or just place random things that I thought would be fun.
This website has different homepages dependign on your device, but it is intended for Desktop users.
It had a whole Achievement / easteregg finding gig.

The design analysis behind this website is not: "Is this a good place for this?", No it goes like: "Hmm where should I place this big clicker game, hmm 1 small button between anything else is a good idea."
This way it has lots of secrets to find.

Easteregg collector.

This website is made with Angular, PHP (backend that might be offline now), MySQL, and a lot of love.

It can run Doom.

This was my main website for a long time, but I have moved on to a new website, but I still keep this one up for the memories.
The reason I switched websites is because it is not really easy access to information like "My projects" etc, and I made the new website at the same time I got my VPS, which made it easy to combine front and back-end.

title: Chess Simulator 256
info:
This is a website I made as a summer project.

âœ¨Totally Normal Chess Simulatorâœ¨

This project started as a normal chess game (without En passant / castling), Reddit had the power to decide what would be added in the next update. Normal chess things or not, didn't matter.
This happened 7 times:

  1. Added Microtransactions
  2. Added Lootboxes
  3. Added Merging Pieces
  4. Added carrying pieces
  5. Added a twist selector
  6. Added a tech tree
  7. Added more pawn varients

Anyone can play this game for free. It's a fun project that I'm proud of.

Tech tree.

Technologies used:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript

You can play this on mobile or desktop, it even has settings to suit your preferences.

title: Project Kazamata
info:
Project Kazamata is a Game Engine / Framework I am making.

The framework.

This is completely customisable. I was / am going to make my own game with it as a Demo.
It is an RPG framework. It even has it's own CLI. (command line interface)

Github

It is open source and can be found on Github

YEET

title: SiSu AI Chatbot
info:
I made an AI chatbot for a company called Simpel Subsidie.
This chatbot is made using:

  • PHP
  • ChatGPT
  • Javascript
